title: Travel
description:
During my first trip to the US, I probably caught a very serious travel fever. Not something you would actually get rid of easily.
Since 2009, I have been traveling to more than 30 different states or countries, having a chance to experience and share with many different and amazing cultures.
Since I started working, I set myself one goal: Travel each month to a foreign country. So far, this has been going great!

title: Acting/Music
description: Since I was a kid, I was fascinated by all those drama shows, and promised myself I would become as good as they would. I practiced acting for 7 years, two among them as a director for a group of young teenagers. I also played the piano, singing, and the guitar for years, and was in a few music bands between 2007 and 2012 (50+ concerts, Lyon Area).

title: Erasmus
description: In 2012, I became lead of the music and concert division of the international student exchange organization Erasmus in both Lyon and Paris. Not only this allows me to stay in touch with live bands and enjoy nice jam sessions, it also enables me to make new friends all around the world.

title: Sports
description: I played rugby for a couple years during college and in California. If it wasn't for my knee, I would still be involved with this amazing and challenging sport. I also played a few years of badminton, and I cannot spend a winter without riding my skis around the slopes.
